articles.title: This Black Hole Devoured a Star Years Ago. Now It's 'Burped' Something Out - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Originally predicted by Einstein's Theory of General Relativity, black holes are the most extreme object in the known Universe.
articles.content:
Originally predicted by Einstein's Theory of General Relativity, black holes are the most extreme object in the known Universe.
